scripts.start: if not exist src\js (mkdir src\js) && copy .\node_modules\flowbite\dist\flowbite.min.js .\src\js\ && npx tailwindcss -i .\src\css\input.css -o .\src\css\output.css --watch
scripts.build: npx tailwindcss -i .\src\css\input.css -o .\dist\css\output.css --minify && if not exist dist\js (mkdir dist\js) && copy .\node_modules\flowbite\dist\flowbite.min.js .\dist\js\ && if not exist dist (mkdir dist) && if not exist dist (mkdir dist) && robocopy src dist *.html /S && if not exist dist\img (mkdir dist\img) && copy .\src\img\* .\dist\img\
